EmailTemplate.description: Notification of new password for Dealer growth portal users
EmailTemplate.name: Communities Dealer Growth: Changed Password Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to the {!Community_Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName} {!Receiving_User.LastName},
Congratulations, your {!Community_Name} account has been set up! This portal will be an easy way for you to record your Growth Program activities and track your results.
Username: {!Receiving_User.Username}
Step 1: Set your password
Please click this link to complete your setup. This link will expire in 24 hours.
Step 2: Log in to bit.ly/dealergrowthprogram using your email address and the password you created.
Step 3: Track your promotional activity requirements using the tab for each metric.
Your sales consultant will be by your store in the near future to personally train you on how to use this new tool.
If you have any problems with this link, please reach out to your sales consultant.
Thanks! Cargill Animal Nutrition
